clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: <li>In order to provide advertisements on the website, we work together with selected cooperation partners (third party providers) who also set cookies.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text:
The following data is stored separately from all other data which you may transmit to us:

  • Date and time of access
  • Browser type and version
  • Operating system
  • URL of the previously visited website

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
On 2024-07-09 17:08:55 UTC, zubairkhatri (31500)  Suspended wrote:
          I’d should seek advice from you here. Which isn’t something I do! I love to reading an article that will get people to believe. Also, thank you allowing me to comment!  Lumina Grand

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service
clauses.description: Usually it's related to the right to object to data processing or restrict it under the GDPR. Users may be able to refuse the use of their data for marketing purposes for instance.
clauses.clause_text:
<li>Right to object - if your personal data are processed on the basis of legitimate interests pursuant to Art.
6 (1) (f) GDPR, you have the right to object to the processing of your personal data pursuant to Art.
21 GDPR for reasons arising from your specific situation or to object to direct marketing.
In the latter case, you have a general right of objection, which you can exercise without giving reasons and without incurring additional costs.

case.text: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service

clauses.title: A list of all cookies set by the website is provided
clauses.description: The service provides users with a complete list of all first and third party cookies its website sets and an explanation of their uses. This information can be valuable for users to make an informed choice whether to allow those cookies.
clauses.clause_text: Here you can find an overview of the cookies set by DeepL:

case.text: A list of all cookies set by the website is provided

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text: For this reason, DeepL collects and uses your personal data exclusively within the framework of the statutory provisions, in particular the General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR")

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites
clauses.description: The service rejects any responsibility for the contents of other websites to which it links.
clauses.clause_text:
Other sites that can be accessed via links from linguee.com provide external information which is not under our control and whose content we do not adopt as our own.
The dissociation of linguee.com from such external content applies to all links, content on our internet presence.

case.text: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites

clauses.title: Conditions may change, but your continued acceptance is not inferred from an earlier acceptance
clauses.description: When you're not logged in to a service, but use it repeatedly, it may still feel weird that their terms and conditions can change between one use and the next. However, this does not violate the rule-of-thumb that each new version should be accepted from scratch, without inferring your acceptance from the acceptance of an earlier version. Since no acceptance is inferred from continued use, but only from current use, we rate this as neutral instead of bad.
clauses.clause_text:
We reserve the right to change this privacy policy.
The current version of the privacy policy can be accessed on our website at any time.

case.text: Conditions may change, but your continued acceptance is not inferred from an earlier acceptance

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: Please note that if you disable cookies in general, the functionality and scope of the website may be affected.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the translations
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: DeepL GmbH does not assume any liability for the accuracy of the offered translations.

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text:
Shortened/anonymized IP address
  • Full IP address (for a maximum of 14 days)

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
